Creating State Diagrams

This example shows how you can create a State Diagram using UmlCanvas. 

+dynamic diagram myStateDiagram {
  [@ 50, 15] state begin  +geo="100x50";
  [@ 50, 90] state middle +geo="200x100";
  [@ 75,120] state sub    +geo="100x50";
  [@150,225] state end    +geo="100x50";
  
  transition begin-middle;
  [@direct:nnw-nnw] transition middle-sub;
  transition sub-end;
}
